channel.title: Lyrics to your favorite song
channel.description:
what are the lyrics to you're favorite song?
These are the lyrics to "Thrist" by "i, parasite"
[quote="Thrist"]It leaves me hurting, spiteful, The dust throat longing, Choking in true form Hopeful, bitter, The last cry pleading, verbal
The thirst comes The face falls It crumbles the plain way In plain view it's forced through at arms length I feel you with gloves on You see me There's no one The thirst's gone
Call me crazy I provide life All this fruit falls All my life blind Sweetened poison Left to die Dry the face That's not me or is it mine?
The thirst comes The face falls It crumbles the plain way In plain view it's forced through at arms length I feel you with gloves on You see me There's no one The thirst's gone[/quote]
see if you lyrics are [url=http://www.lyricsandsongs.com]here[/url]

item.title: Lyrics to your favorite song
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Rofl, your not thinking I’m about to search/paste lyrics here do you? You can search them yourself : Trashed and Scattered (from Avenged Sevenfold) . One of the best sentences : “Label me that’s fine, I’ll be somebody else”

Read full topic

item.title: Lyrics to your favorite song
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

what are the lyrics to you’re favorite song?

These are the lyrics to “Thrist” by “i, parasite”

[quote=“Thrist”]It leaves me hurting, spiteful,
The dust throat longing,
Choking
in true form Hopeful,
bitter,
The last cry pleading,
verbal

The thirst comes
The face falls
It crumbles
the plain way
In plain view
it’s forced through
at arms length
I feel you with gloves on
You see me
There’s no one
The thirst’s gone

Call me crazy
I provide life
All this fruit falls
All my life blind
Sweetened poison
Left to die
Dry the face
That’s not me
or is it mine?

The thirst comes
The face falls
It crumbles
the plain way
In plain view
it’s forced through
at arms length
I feel you with gloves on
You see me
There’s no one
The thirst’s gone[/quote]

see if you lyrics are here
